entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 02:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -31.4°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -34.5°C
Wind: SW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 35 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
